sumarize_req: Cát Đằng Coffee (CDC), a popular multi-branch coffee chain and trademark of Én Bạc Co., Ltd., requires a centralized management system to integrate and oversee operations across its numerous locations nationwide. The system aims to support local branch staff, streamline workflows such as order taking (minimizing waiter movement) and automatic bill generation, and enable comprehensive revenue reporting for individual branches and the entire chain, facilitating efficient business management and informed decision-making.
